name: Brookdale Senior Living Inc.
description: Brookdale Senior Living Inc. is a leading national provider of senior living services in the United States, committed to enhancing the quality of life for seniors. Founded in 1978 and headquartered in Brentwood, Tennessee, Brookdale operates a vast network of senior living communities, offering a range of services including independent living, assisted living, Alzheimer's and dementia care, and rehabilitation. With a mission to enrich the lives of seniors, Brookdale focuses on creating a warm, welcoming environment where residents can thrive. The company's dedicated staff provides personalized care and support to meet the diverse needs of its residents, fostering independence and dignity at every stage of life. Brookdale leverages innovative programs and technologies to enhance the living experience, ensuring that seniors remain engaged and connected with their communities. As a publicly traded company on the New York Stock Exchange, Brookdale is committed to transparency and accountability, consistently striving to improve its services and expand its reach to serve more seniors across the nation.

seo.meta_title: Brookdale Senior Living Inc. | Leading Provider of Senior Living Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Brookdale Senior Living Inc., a national leader in senior living services. Discover our commitment to enhancing the quality of life for seniors through personalized care.

faq.question: What types of services does Brookdale offer?
faq.answer: Brookdale offers independent living, assisted living, memory care, and rehabilitation services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Brookdale Senior Living?
faq.answer: Lucinda Baier is the CEO of Brookdale Senior Living Inc.

faq.question: Where is Brookdale headquartered?
faq.answer: Brookdale is headquartered in Brentwood, Tennessee, USA.
